title: Ys X: Nordics - Attachment Pack
description: A pack of DLC-exclusive attachments, from eyewear to earrings to hair extensions and more.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
A pack of DLC-exclusive attachments, from eyewear to earrings to hair extensions and more.

Contains the following sets:
　● Eyewear Set: Cool
　　- Square Glasses x2
　　- Round Sunglasses x2
　　- Eyepatch x2
　● Eyewear Set: Fun
　　- Classic Glasses x2
　　- Sporty Sunglasses x2
　　- Beaglepuss x2
　● Earwear Set
　　- Ear Clip (Left) x2
　　- Ear Clip (Right) x2
　　- Ear Clips (Both Ears) x2
　　- Mana Seed Earrings (V) x2
　　- Mana Seed Earrings (M) x2
　　- Mana Seed Earrings (O) x2
　　- Crabby Earrings x2
　● Hair Extension & Color Set: Wild
　　- Beast Ears x2
　　- Karja's Side Ponytail x2
　　- Brethren Style (Adol)
　　- Brethren Style (Karja)
　　- Wallcrusher Style (Adol)
　　- Wild-Child Style (Karja)
　● Hair Extension & Color Set: Vivid
　　- Norman Beard x2
　　- Cowlick x2
　　- Mana Style (Adol)
　　- Mana Style (Karja)
　　- Dark Style (Adol)
　　- Dark Style (Karja)
　● Mini Standee Set
　　- Mini Standee (Adol) x2
　　- Mini Standee (Karja) x2
　　- Mini Standee (Grenn) x2
　　- Mini Standee (Rosa) x2
　　- Mini Standee (Cruz) x2
　　- Mini Standee (Mirabel) x2
　　- Mini Standee (Rafe) x2
　　- Mini Standee (Dogi) x2
　　- Mini Standee (H&P) x2
　● Head-Topper Set
　　- Hugill Head-Topper x2
　　- Twinklemush Head-Topper x2
　　- Shark Head-Topper x2
　● Horn Set
　　- Sorcerer's Horns x2
　　- Raging Bull Horns x2
　　- Ye Olde Norman Horns x2
　● Scarf Set
　　- Mana Wielder's Scarf (Fire) x2
　　- Mana Wielder's Scarf (Ice) x2
　　- Immortal's Scarf x2
　● Shield Set
　　- Cleria Shield x2
　　- Raven Shield x2
　　- Balta Seaforce Shield x2
　● Sea Life Set
　　- Pickaback Penguin x2
　　- Pickaback Sunfish x2
　　- Pickaback Sea Turtle x2

*Items can be obtained by selecting the purchased content in the "DLC" tab of your Inventory, accessed via the Main Menu ingame.
*Once obtained, these items can be equipped in the "Cosmetics" section of the Equipment screen, accessed via the Main Menu.
